original: mgo bo'i steng gi zhal ni ser po'o //
analyzed: mgo bo'i steng gi zhal ni ser po'o //

original: rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i rtse gsum pa ral pa'i cod pan can no //üîΩphyag g-yas pa'i phyag lnga na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang / rdo rje sngon po dang / mda' dang / lcags kyu dang / khab rnams phyag na'o //üîΩg-yon pa'i phyag lnga rnams su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor @31a * //

translated: She has a crown of matted hair with a crest jewel adorned with various jewels.üîΩIn her five right hands she holds sun disks, a blue vajra, an arrow, a goad, and a needle.

original: dang / gzhu dang / mya ngan med pa'i yal ga dang / zhags pa dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub dang / skud pa rnams phyag na'o //
analyzed: dang / gzhu dang / mya ngan med pa'i yal ga dang / zhags pa dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub dang / skud pa rnams phyag na'o //
translated: In her five left hands she holds moon disks, a bow, an ashoka branch, a threatening gesture with a noose, and a thread.

original: sna tshogs pa'i rin po ches spras ba'i rna rgyan dang / dbu rgyan dang / lag gdub dang / dril bu g-yer kha dang bcas pa'i ska rags kyis gos kyi rnam par brgyan pa'i lus so //
analyzed: sna tshogs pa'i rin po ches spras ba'i rna rgyan dang / dbu rgyan dang / lag gdub dang / dril bu g-yer kha dang bcas pa'i ska rags kyis gos kyi rnam par brgyan pa'i lus so //
translated: She is adorned with earrings, a head ornament, bracelets, anklets, and a belt with small bells, and with a body adorned with garments.

original: lang tsho dar la bab pa sha 'gag dang / stod g-yogs dkar po mchod rten gyi khong du gnas pa'i phag pa bdun gyi shing rta la zhon pa'o //
analyzed: lang tsho dar la bab pa sha 'gag dang / stod g-yogs dkar po mchod rten gyi khong du gnas pa'i phag pa bdun gyi shing rta la zhon pa'o //
translated: She is in the prime of youth, with full breasts, wearing a white shawl, and riding a chariot drawn by seven boars standing in the interior of a stupa.

original: khyab 'jug dang / dbang po dang / bde byed dang / tshangs pa zhabs bzhis mnan pa'o //
analyzed: khyab 'jug dang / dbang po dang / bde byed dang / tshangs pa zhabs bzhis mnan pa'o //

original: de'i shing rta'i dbus su gnas pa'i chu srin mnan pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma gzhan te /
analyzed: de'i shing rta'i dbus su gnas pa'i chu srin mnan pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma gzhan te /
translated: There is another Bhagavati in the center of the chariot, trampling on a makara.

original: de yang sku mdog nag mo phag gi gdong pa can /
analyzed: de yang sku mdog nag mo phag gi gdong pa can /
translated: She is also black, with the face of a pig.

original: rdo rje dang sdigs mdzub ni g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i phyag na'o //
analyzed: rdo rje dang sdigs mdzub ni g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i phyag na'o //

original: g-yas phyogs su lha mo gzhan phag gi zhal dmar mo phyag bzhi pa lcags kyu dang ; khab ni g-yas kyi phyag gnyis na'o //
analyzed: g-yas phyogs su lha mo gzhan phag gi zhal dmar mo phyag bzhi pa lcags kyu dang ; khab ni g-yas kyi phyag gnyis na'o //
translated: She holds a goad and a needle in her two right hands,

original: sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang skud pa ni g-yon gyi phyag gnyis na'o //
analyzed: sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang skud pa ni g-yon gyi phyag gnyis na'o //

original: rgyan bzang pos yang dag par brgyan pa'o //
analyzed: rgyan bzang pos yang dag par brgyan pa'o //
translated: She is adorned with excellent ornaments.

original: g-yon phyogs su rje btsun ma gzhan te de yang phag zhal mdog dmar ba rna ba'i bar du bkang pa'i gzhu dang ; mda' dang / rdo rje dang / mya ngan med pa'i yal ga ni g-yas dang / g-yon pa'i phyag na'o //
analyzed: g-yon phyogs su rje btsun ma gzhan te de yang phag zhal mdog dmar ba rna ba'i bar du bkang pa'i gzhu dang ; mda' dang / rdo rje dang / mya ngan med pa'i yal ga ni g-yas dang / g-yon pa'i phyag na'o //

original: sna tshogs pa'i na bzas brgyan pa ste /
analyzed: sna tshogs pa'i na bzas brgyan pa ste /

original: shing rta 'dren pa'i phag gi 'og na nyi ma la sogs pa'i gza' chen po dgu dang / nye bar 'tshe ba'i nad kyi tshogs rnams lhung nas /
analyzed: shing rta 'dren pa'i phag gi 'og na nyi ma la sogs pa'i gza' chen po dgu dang / nye bar 'tshe ba'i nad kyi tshogs rnams lhung nas /
translated: Under the pig that is pulling the chariot, the nine great planets such as the sun and the host of afflictive diseases fall,

original: mi'i gzugs kyis gnas pa'o //
analyzed: mi'i gzugs kyis gnas pa'o //

original: de lta bu'i gzugs kyi bcom ldan 'das ma bsams la /
analyzed: de lta bu'i gzugs kyi bcom ldan 'das ma bsams la /
translated: One should imagine the Blessed Lady in such a form.

original: snying gar zla ba la mam las byung ba'i 'od zer gyis de bzhin gshegs pa bkug ste /
analyzed: snying gar zla ba la mam las byung ba'i 'od zer gyis de bzhin gshegs pa bkug ste /
translated: At the heart, from ma·πÉ, light rays summon the tathƒÅgatas.

original: dbang bskur blangs nas dbu la rnam par snang mdzad kyis dbu brgyan par bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: dbang bskur blangs nas dbu la rnam par snang mdzad kyis dbu brgyan par bsam par bya'o //

original: lte ba nas kha ru /
analyzed: lte ba nas kha ru /

analyzed: kha nas yang lte ba la sogs par 'khor lo 'khor ba'i rim pas sngags bzlas par bya'o //

original: de la 'di ni sngags yin te /

original: rang gi sa bon gyi byin gyis brlabs la /

translated: Having been empowered by one‚Äôs seed syllable,

original: zas la sogs pa thams cad la rjes su gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: zas la sogs pa thams cad la rjes su gnas par bya'o //
translated: one should remain in the aftermath of all activities, such as eating.

analyzed: skyo na yi ge brgya pa'i sngags brjod la /
